root.name: Disney's Bolt
root.description: The 2 main characters of the game are bolt (Voiced By John Travolta) and Penny (Voiced by Miley Cyrus). As Penny you have to sneak around and cause as little alarm as possible. The totally opposite is for bolt. Your objective is to destroy as many people as possible and get the biggest combos. A few moves bolt has is superbark and laser eyes. These cause devastating damage to your enemy.
